title:
Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds
descriptions:
Introducing Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, the ultimate companion for your shooting range experience! With their dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers, these earmuffs deliver crystal clear sound quality, allowing you to stay fully engaged in your surroundings. 

But that's not all - these earmuffs feature an impressive sound-activated compression reaction time of just 0.02 seconds, ensuring that sudden loud noises are instantly suppressed for your safety and comfort. Plus, with independent volume controls, you have the freedom to adjust the sound to your preference without compromising on clarity.

You'll also appreciate the noise reduction rating of 23 dB, providing excellent protection against harmful noise levels. The 2 omnidirectional microphones enhance your ability to detect even the faintest sounds, making these earmuffs a must-have for any shooting enthusiast.

For added convenience, these earmuffs come equipped with an audio input jack, allowing you to connect your favorite devices and enjoy your music or podcasts while staying protected. The recessed volume control knobs ensure that you can make adjustments effortlessly, even while wearing gloves.

And when it comes to power, we've got you covered. The Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs come with 2 AAA batteries included, so you can start using them right away. With a compact size of 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and a lightweight design of just 0.98 pounds, these earmuffs are easy to carry and won't weigh you down.

But it's not just about functionality - we've also prioritized your comfort. The metal wire frame headband ensures a secure and comfortable fit, while the foldable design allows for easy storage when not in use.

Constructed with a composite housing for superior sound dampening, these earmuffs are built to last. Don't compromise on your hearing protection - choose Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs for an unparalleled shooting range experience.

Introducing the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, the ultimate hearing protection for your shooting range experience. These earmuffs feature dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers, ensuring crystal clear sound reproduction that enhances your shooting accuracy. 

With a lightning-fast sound-activated compression reaction time of just 0.02 seconds and independent volume controls, you can stay focused and react swiftly to every sound around you. The noise reduction rating of 23 dB provides superior hearing protection, keeping you safe from loud noises without compromising your ability to hear important commands and conversations.

Equipped with two omnidirectional microphones, these earmuffs capture and amplify ambient sounds, allowing you to maintain situational awareness. The audio input jack enables you to connect your favorite audio devices, so you can enjoy your favorite tunes while shooting.

The recessed volume control knobs offer precise adjustments, ensuring optimal sound levels for your comfort. Plus, with two AAA batteries included, you can start using these earmuffs right away. 

Measuring at 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and weighing just 0.98 pounds, these earmuffs are lightweight and portable, making them easy to carry to the shooting range. The comfortable metal wire frame headband provides a secure fit, while its foldable design allows for convenient storage.

Crafted with a composite housing for sound dampening, these earmuffs offer exceptional noise reduction while maintaining a sleek and stylish look. 

Upgrade your shooting experience with the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs. Don't compromise on safety or sound quality - get yours today!
